name: Live Interior 3D Compressed Document
summary: Learn about .LIZD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Live Interior 3D for Mac was succeeded by Live Home 3D for Mac. LIZD files are still supported by Live Home 3D for Mac.

description: Compressed interior design project file created by Live Interior 3D home and interior design software; saves the compressed version of a .LI3D document; used for reducing the storage size of projects for emailing and archiving.
